name: Mozaik Business Services
goal:
After corporate carrier I established my own company (2005) specialised for SME, providing: Business Development Consultancy, Training & Executive Coach and Mentoring. My specific area of expertise are: Agro/Fishery/Food; Pharmaceutical; Chemical; Bio Science; Industrial Equipment; Advance manufacturing Industries; Emerging Industries (created across different sectors); Smart specialisation & Digitalisation.

Continuous education and knowledge enhancement is my imperative.
Beside MBA degree from London Henley Business School, I am Certified Knowledge Manger, specialised for Knowledge based Economy and triple helix model (public/Industry/R&D).

My core competences relate to: business strategies; market & industry positioning; go to market route; innovation & knowledge management; projects development & assessment.
Furthermore I am assessor expert for H2020 programmes (SME instrument; Fast track to innovation, Clusters for Innovation Value Chains).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Agro - Food - Innovation - Rural development; Bio Based Industries.
Acting as an Advisor, Facilitator, and Events & Conference Moderator, and projects evaluation & monitoring.
Areas of expertise:
- Entrepreneurship; small scales businesses competitiveness and growth
- Innovation management; Innovative (bio-based) business models
- Value chains; Clusters; Triple helix models for local and regional development
- Circular economy; Resources efficiency; Smart Farming
Emerging Industries (new industries created across related or different sectors)
- Smart specialisation; Digitalisation; Horizontal themes (employment, gender balance, sustainability)
